name: mosaic-dataset-geo
description: Geographic adapters for DataSets. Used to manage GeoJSON entities.

scripts.bump: npm test && webpack && npm version patch && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.bump-minor: npm run bump && npm version minor && git push && git push --tags && npm publish

author: Mikhail Kotelnikov <mikhail.kotelnikov@ubimix.com>
